10.5.2 <socket-error>

<internal-socket-error>

Condition

Superclasses: <socket-error>
The class of unexpected errors from Functional Developer's Winsock2 library, an FFI interface to the native socket library Winsock2.
Inspect the contents of the socket-condition-details slot for more information.
System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
